txt.en: 'Hello, friend. We of the Iron Garrison have begun the work of reclaiming Moria from the foul creatures that now reside here. My superiors have tasked me with leading the efforts to reclaim Sejer-tharâkh from whatever intruders reside within.\n\n'Thinking myself somewhat competent in battle, I tried my best to expell the undesirables within. Unfortunately, I am hardly a warrior of repute and was forced to withdraw. You, on the other hand, look like you have got it in you to handle all manner of beasts or Orcs. Might I hire you to aid me in my efforts?'

'You appear to be a more capable warrior than I. Of course, I will only admit this between you and me. A dwarf has to maintain his reputation!\n\n'Now that the intruders within Sejer-tharâkh have been thinned, we can more fully explore it. Happily, this means my efforts are ahead of schedule, and for that, you deserve a reward!'
'Have you completed your task yet? Please do so, then return to me when you have finished.'

The Iron Garrison is striving to reclaim the long forgotten store-houses of Moria. Tasked by his superiors, Torfi is attempting to drive the intruders out of Sejer-tharâkh. With his previous attempts to do so being unsuccessful, Torfi has turned to other adventurers within Moria to aid him in his task.
The entrance to Sejer-tharâkh lies within Mezer-serej.\n\nTorfi has asked you to assist him in clearing Sejer-tharâkh of the intruders within.
Torfi can be found at Mezer-serej in the eastern halls of Zelem-melek.\n\nYou should return to Torfi to receive a reward for your efforts.
